item.description:
Our next meeting will be held on August 11, Thursday at 7:00 pm.

I've had a challenging summer and wasn't sure exactly if and when I could come back to Reading but I'm travel ready and have made my plans.  Sorry for the short notice.

We will be caring and sharing this meeting.  Bring any and all good, positive information you might have for the group.  As always personal concerns are a topic of discussion as well.  We are here for support and help with our journey through the maze that is Fibromyalgia.

I am still offering Lifewave patching sessions for anyone that wants to try them.  I am seeing amazing results with pain, energy, detoxification and deep healing with these patches.  To learn more go to lifewave.com/ewps to see videos and comment on these nanotechnology patches.  They not only work well for pain issues but for brain dysfunction i.e. Parkinsons, MS etc.  Suzanne Somers the ambassador for the company uses the Glutathione and inflammation patches to help the immune system fight cancer.

If you want to set up a session (usually takes 15-20 minutes to get the proper placement and results) call me at 623-251-7547 and we can set up a time at my office.  There is no cost for this.

See you in August I hope.

 

Betsy
item.how_to_find_us: At the Senior Center Lounge on Pleasant Street Reading upstairs
item.name: get together
